phrases: Now that I have gotten used to living on my own in Nagoya,
I went home for the first time in a while, and I got quite a shock.
Takeo, of all people, now has a girlfriend.
Not to mention, his girlfriend seems to have a secret she cannot tell Takeo.
Takeo-kun, I wonder if you are looking at the Moon and the stars.
I have never seen a shooting star.
I hope we can see a meteor shower together someday.
I always end each day thinking it was a great day.
Yamato, do not hold it all in.
I want you to laugh at the end of each day, too.
Why are you reading shoujo manga?
I am just trying to learn as much as I can about how girls think.
Are you going to see Yamato-san today, too?
No, I have got no such plans today.
You will die from cuteness overload!
All Because of Love My Boyfriend and Me
Maybe she has a younger boyfriend?
Maybe I will go say hi.
Come with me and do not tell Takeo.
I think I will go home early.
Sure, I am leaving once I finish this one.
There is something I would like to ask you.
You are hiding something from Takeo, are not you?
He knows you are hiding something.
But because he does not know what it is, he is worried sick about it.
You are having a hard time telling Takeo, right?
I will not say a word about it to him.
I want Takeo to be happy!
I need him to be happy!
I am not the good person Takeo-kun thinks I am!
He goes to sleep early and wakes up early.
And his eyebrows and sideburns really get to me!
And his broad shoulders and nice pecs...
They have got great form, right?
And his lips are so sexy!
You do not find many of them in Japan!
His hands are so big, too.
he will not lay a finger on me until I grow up.
Takeo-kun seems to think that I am really pure and stuff,
I really want to cuddle, and hold hands, and stuff.
When I am with him, I have impure thoughts.
But how can I tell him that?
If I did, he would stop liking me.
I mean, he would definitely back off...
Even if that is the case, I will be fine.
It is more important to me that Yamato's in knots about it.
Listen, Takeo is not that fragile!
He would not back away, just because of something like that!
He is the kind of man who will try to accept you head-on, no matter what!
so I do not blame you for misreading him,
He said, If Yamato will not tell me,
I will not have a clue.
But he also said he would help, if only you would tell him!
I will go over to his place right now!
Takeo's girlfriend is a nice girl.
Why did you fall for Takeo?
so guys started saying I looked like the statue,
and gave me the nickname Growing Statue.
It did a number on my self-confidence as a girl.
But when I was in sixth grade,
Takeo, who was in third grade at the time...
Takeo, you are done with practice?
It is that thing in the flower shop...
I do not know what it is called,
but you remind me of that flower.
It might seem like nothing special to others, but it is special to you!
That is what it is like to fall in love.
Why did not you tell him?
We were three grades apart in elementary school!
When I was a first-year in high school,
he was a first-year in junior high!
I never thought he would start dating someone!
But I was hoping it would at least take him until college!
You just said he is not the type
to worry about something like that.
The cat was having trouble getting out of a tree.
I guess I was trying too hard to hide my feelings.
I was not trying hard enough to win Takeo over.
maybe he would have run that fast for me, too.
I wish I would been born a man!
You can stay friends with him forever!
Even though I was in the judo club,
I came in first three years in a row
in my junior high school's marathon,
beating track and field, soccer, and basketball guys.
I am glad I am a fast runner.
I am glad I can run for a long time.
You ran all the way here for me, Takeo-kun...
you have been troubled by something, right?
Tell me everything you are thinking about.
Hit me with all you have got!
I will not keel over, no matter what.
I want to hold hands with you.
I do want to snuggle and stuff...
I am sorry I am not as pure a girl as you thought I was.
Is there anything else you would like to do?
M-Maybe I would like to walk with you like this for a bit.
Maybe we can go to a nearby park.
am I correct in thinking that
if I want to hold your hand, I do not need to hold back?
Then do not hold back, either, Yamato.
She is a very nice person!
Then what do you like about Yamato-san, Takeo?
Remember how, the day after we met, I went over to your place?
I know I said I would asked around at the station,
Actually, I knew from your uniform that you went to Shuuei High School,
so I went there and asked around.
And about how I forgot my cell in your room...
I thought I would not see you again if I did not have a reason, so...
I just had to see you again.
You said I was a good person, but...
She went through a lot of trouble to see me.
I am so happy you said that!
I was scared that if I told you the truth, you would not like me anymore!
Now that I am relieved, I guess I am crying...
When I got out of the fire,
I swore a vow to myself
that I would never make you cry again.
Think you can go to sleep smiling tonight?
I will probably be grinning ear to ear.
Are you sure you are okay with all this?
You do not have to rush back, you know.
I now know that Takeo's a happy man.
I would not want him to see me like this, anyway...
Takeo-kun, the stars are beautiful today!
I saw my first-ever shooting star!
I just happened to be thinking about you,
so I made a wish that I could stay with you forever.
By then, the star had already gone,
but maybe I made my wish in time?
I have a favor to ask.
I held hands with Yamato today,
but I kind of failed at it.
How the hell do you fail at holding hands?
When we kiss, I would not want my teeth to hit hers.
Why do not you practice with a pillow
I just cannot get a good sense of distance with a pillow.
That would be an insult to Yamato!
You are good at keeping secrets.
I cannot think of anyone else I can ask!
Stop, you are crossing a line...
If we use this between, there is no problem.
Dude, it is a huge problem
I am resolved to do this!
You should be, too, if you call yourself a man!
Dude, there is something wrong with your logic for sure...
I will become a man you can depend on.
From now on, go to sleep with a smile on your face!
